title: Novavax, Zoom Video, Moderna, Nike: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today; Vaccine makers and Zoom Video are up premarket; Travel stocks and energy producers are taking a hit
text:
* Zoom Video Communications gained 2.6% ahead of the bell, on a broadly down day. Seems people are expecting to be spending more time with colleagues in video chat before face-to-face becomes the norm again.

Nita Patel, right, senior director of vaccine development at Novavax, checked cell cultures that were infected with a pseudo-virus, developed by Novavax to test their Covid-19 vaccine, Feb. 11, 2021. PHOTO: T.J. Kirkpatrick for The Wall Street Journal

* Shares of Covid-19 vaccine makers were rising premarket as broader markets were in decline amid Omicron fears. Novavax soared 11% premarket. On Friday the company and Serum Institute of India said the World Health Organization has granted Emergency Use Listing for its shot. In Japan, Takeda Pharmaceutical has submitted a new drug application for Novavax's Covid-19 vaccine candidate to the country's authorities.

* Fellow vaccine maker Moderna was also up, by 7.5%. The company said a third dose of its Covid-19 vaccine increased immune responses against the Omicron variant compared with two doses in lab tests. Pfizer was also up, by 1.1%.

* Energy companies slipped premarket as crude prices were down around 3%. Occidental Petroleum dropped 4%, Devon Energy shed 3.1% and ConocoPhillips slipped 2.4%.

* Cruise operators were running aground. Carnival dropped 3.2% and Royal Caribbean fell 3.5%. Other travel stocks were broadly lower. Delta Air Lines shed 3.2%, Hilton Hotels slipped 1.9% and Booking Holdings dropped 2.7%.

* Nike, Micron Technology and Braze are among the companies reporting earnings on Monday.

Chart of the Day

* Speculative stocks have been crushed, even when the wider market reached new highs. Many blame the Federal Reserve, but the link between monetary policy and speculation is less clear than it seems, writes columnist James Mackintosh.

Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com

Novavax, Zoom Video, Moderna, Nike: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
